acceptance-test-run.title: Display a message if the search string does not match any case
acceptance-test-run.name: Display a message if the search string does not match any case

tag.name: Search for shipments/Search for shipments by customer

test-step.description: Given There are 5 shipments, one from customer MyStuff, one from customer MySofa and 3 from customer Stuff24
When I show the list of current shipments
And I enter "abc" into the search input field
Then I see a message "no shipment found for 'abc'"
